Title: Spectrally-efficient single sideband 16-QAM Nyquist-subcarrier modulation-based WDM transmission using an InP dual-drive Mach-Zehnder modulator and direct-detection
Abstract: © 2015 Viajes el Corte Ingles, VECISA.We experimentally demonstrated 16 GHz-spaced 25 Gb/s per channel WDM transmission over 242 km of standard SMF at a net information spectral density of 1.46 b/s/Hz using SSB Nyquist-shaped subcarrier modulation generated with an InP dual-drive Mach-Zehnder modulator.
